dc_creator_sm: James D. Proctor. Data obtained from U.S. Census and processed by SR and JDP.
dc_description_s: 5-year American Community Survey (ACS) data at block group scale for Multnomah, Washington, and Clackamas counties. Data downloaded from U.S. Census site, then simplified into attributes of general interest, including population/households, sex, age, race/ethnicity, education, income, employment, home ownership, home size. See attachment for details on attributes. Tabular data joined with Portland Metro 2010 block group geometry.
dc_title_s: Portland American Community Survey Census Data, 2009-2013
